[EndSkill] For this turn and next turn, gain [AttackDown] and [DefenseDown] equal to the Clash Power gained with this Skill. (max 15)

levelList.name: Blasting Shatterslash [爆碎斬]

levelList.name: Tanglecleaver [快刀亂麻]
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with [Prey]
Can Clash with this Skill regardless of Speed; this unit does not become Staggered before it uses this Skill
[WhenUse] Consume all [BattleSense] Stack on self. If this unit consumed...
- ... 10+ Stack , gain Atk Weight +1 for every 10 Stack consumed (max 2)
- ... 25 Stack, Final Power +1 for every 4 (sum of [Combustion] and [Vibration] on the main target) (max 5)
[DefeatDuel] Deal -80% damage; this Skill's damage cannot Stagger the target; inflict only half the Potency and Count for both [Combustion] and [Vibration] inflicted by this Skill (unless raised by other effects)
[EndSkill] [FullReload] (once per turn)
- If this unit has [BulletPropellantSpecial], [ReloadKeepAmmo] instead (once per turn)
[DefeatDuel] Deal -50% final damage
[EndSkill] Ends this turn

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Combustion], [Combustion] Count, [Vibration], and [Vibration] Count by [BulletPropellant] spent
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion] 3 times; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 3

- ... 10+ Stack , gain Atk Weight +1 for every 10 Stack consumed (max 4)
- ... 25 Stack, Final Power +1 for every 4 (sum of [Combustion] and [Vibration] on the main target) (max 6)
- ... 50 Stack, Coin Power +1 and deal +50% damage
[DefeatDuel] Deal -80% damage; this Skill's damage cannot Stagger the target; inflict only half the Potency and Count for both [Combustion] and [Vibration] inflicted by this Skill (unless raised by other effects)
[EndSkill] [FullReload] (once per turn)
- If this unit has [BulletPropellantSpecial], [ReloadKeepAmmo] instead (once per turn)
[DefeatDuel] Deal -50% final damage
[EndSkill] Ends this turn

coindescs.desc: [UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion] 5 times; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 5
